column1: Alright, recently... Recently we've all come to know the fishsticks joke as probably the funniest, most awesome joke ever, but who originally came up with it? Well here's your answer. Joining us tonight, the brains behind the incredible fishsticks joke, the one and only Carlos Mencia.
So Carlos, you've got a show on Comedy Central, a stand-up tour, where did you have time to come up with this classic joke?
